name: @darkflare/jwt
description: A simple JWT library for Cloudflare Workers.

scripts.publish:canary: npm version prerelease --preid=canary && npm publish --tag canary --access public
scripts.publish:patch: npm version patch && npm publish --access public
scripts.publish:minor: npm version minor && npm publish --access public
scripts.publish:major: npm version major && npm publish --access public

author: Azury <hello@azury.dev> (https://azury.dev)
